Unemployment is at 14%. That's tens of millions of Americans. Many of them still haven't received any update on their stimulus check. @IRSnews and Congress MUST do more to deliver timely updates & payments to families that are counting every dollar.
https://t.co/3iJHUHmjlM

Millions of Americans are still waiting on stimulus checks. They're unable to get updates, because IRS phone lines aren't being staffed. At a time of heightened stress, we can't leave people in the dark. I'm pushing @IRSnews to provide timely updates & information to taxpayers. https://t.co/XlLkyiOo6n

Revenues have dropped sharply, but localities still have to keep the lights on, the water running, and provide EMS services. I've spoken with #VA07 county-level leaders and heard from them directly about the serious challenges they're facing. (1/2) https://t.co/C6WwcA2kRE

Thank you for your leadership on this issue @WhipClyburn. COVID-19 has highlighted what rural Virginians have already known for years ‚Äì internet access is a utility, not a luxury. No American should be left behind in telehealth, education, or business because of their zip code. https://t.co/HVhqJdxeaU

Across the United States, nurses are physically exposed without adequate PPE and mentally battered by the nonstop stress of this crisis. Today, I thank Virginia's nurses, and I promise to not stop fighting for the support and equipment you need. #NationalNursesDay

With revenues plummeting, many of our small and rural communities are struggling to maintain essential services like water, power, and EMS. We need to empower our local leaders with greater flexibility to spend federal relief dollars as they see fit. #VA07 https://t.co/nXzYvOzp65

I'm working to get local #VA07 county governments included in the next COVID-19 response package. Virginians living in small and rural counties pay federal taxes just like everyone else, and they also need aid right now. https://t.co/ZmEVgH5kT6

One of the things I miss most during this time is seeing my #VA07 neighbors face-to-face. Until we can gather again, I'm holding telephone and virtual events to provide updates and answer questions. If you missed one, listen to the full recording here: https://t.co/dlXQHCwrvJ

I'm supporting the bipartisan CONNECT for Health Act to extend Medicare coverage of telehealth services after the COVID-19 pandemic has ended. Our seniors should have all the options to make the best choice for their care.
https://t.co/XBHmc8nxGh

Teachers have a deeper impact on their communities than we can ever measure. In this crisis, behind every business owner, doctor, nurse, and researcher is a teacher who nurtured their talents and honed their skills. To all our #VA07 educators, thank you. #TeacherAppreciationDay https://t.co/rHk5isFJLI

Efficiency is crucial, but so is accuracy. Misinformation & false positives won't help us protect the vulnerable or reopen any faster. After pressure from @RepDonBeyer and I, I'm encouraged to see @US_FDA tightening their review of antibody tests. https://t.co/hyCyUM4HEz

.@RepDonBeyer and I have been pushing for a thorough FDA safety review of the 100+ unapproved COVID-19 antibody tests on the market. We successfully got @US_FDA to reverse its policy that allowed companies to market unreliable tests to Americans. https://t.co/pbsyz6yNk3

Yesterday, House Democrats & Republicans came together to pass a fourth COVID-19 response package, which addresses urgent needs like PPP funding. President Trump signed the bill into law today. More details on what's in this bill for #VA07 (Thread): https://t.co/lfWTP54uIn

This bill delivers relief that #VA07 needs right now ‚Äì including billions of additional dollars for PPP loans, EIDL loans, and COVID-19 testing. We have lots of work ahead, but I'm heartened to see the House working together to pass this bill by 388-5.
